hymn.title: A cat has a silky fur

layout.singingstanza: A cat has a silk -- y fur, and a deep and friend -- ly purr, But let me know, if it steps on your toe, Will it be sor -- ry? I don't think so.

lyrics.stanza: A cat has a silky fur, and a deep and friendly purr, But let me know, if it steps on your toe, Will it be sorry? I don't think so.
